@graph.name: Ultimate Peanut Butter Oreo Muffins - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: These peanut butter Oreo muffins are seriously amazing! Incredibly easy to make, heavenly chocolaty, and so decadent! And they're a real eye-catcher!

@graph.headline: Ultimate Peanut Butter Oreo Muffins
@graph.keywords: Oreo muffins,oreo recipes,vegan chocolate muffins,vegan Oreo muffins,vegan Oreo recipes,vegan peanut butter chocolate muffins

@graph.name: Ultimate Peanut Butter Oreo Muffins
@graph.description: These peanut butter Oreo muffins are seriously amazing! Incredibly easy to make, heavenly chocolaty, and so decadent! A real eye-catcher for your next birthday party! And of course vegan.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup almond milk or other plant-based milk

recipeInstructions.text: First make the vegan chocolate muffin batter. In a bowl, combine all ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: First make the vegan chocolate muffin batter. In a bowl, combine all ingredients and stir with a wooden spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Line a muffin tray with paper liners.
recipeInstructions.name: Line a muffin tray with paper liners.

recipeInstructions.text: Then make the Oreo peanut butter stacks that go inside of the muffins. You need two Oreo cookies for each muffin. Put some peanut butter on the first Oreo, put the second on top, and again spread some peanut butter on top of it.  Put one stack in each paper liner.
recipeInstructions.name: Then make the Oreo peanut butter stacks that go inside of the muffins. You need two Oreo cookies for each muffin. Put some peanut butter on the first Oreo, put the second on top, and again spread some peanut butter on top of it.  Put one stack in each paper liner.

recipeInstructions.text:
Evenly add the muffin batter on top of each stack (about 2-3 tablespoons for each muffin). 
Make sure it runs down the side of the Oreo stacks. Sprinkle with the chopped peanuts.
recipeInstructions.name:
Evenly add the muffin batter on top of each stack (about 2-3 tablespoons for each muffin). 
Make sure it runs down the side of the Oreo stacks. Sprinkle with the chopped peanuts.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake for 18 minutes. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 °F and bake for 18 minutes. Enjoy!
